testcase.name: Variable Aspect Tests for Default Dimensions
testcase.description: Tests of variable aspect tests for default dimension

variation.name: Default dimension always present
variation.description: This case is used to attest that the formula processor must succeed to bind the fact when its associated variable has a concept filter and an explicit dimension filter with its default member, and when this concept is not linked to any hypercube containing this dimension in the taxonomy. (Contributed by Haizhen Li, Bank of France, 2012-04-13, by e-mail of same date to Formula WG)
